org.gearvrf.script

Class GVRScriptBundle

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gearvrf.script.GVRScriptBundle

  • public class GVRScriptBundle
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a script bundle loaded from a JSON file, and its storage volume.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  GVRScriptBundle.GVRScriptBundleFile
      The content of the bundle file is loaded from a JSON file.

    • Field Summary

      The contents of the script bundle from a JSON file.

      protected GVRResourceVolume volume
      The volume of the script bundle.

    • Field Detail

      • gvrContext

        protected GVRContext gvrContext

      • file

        protected GVRScriptBundle.GVRScriptBundleFile file
        The contents of the script bundle from a JSON file.

      • volume

        protected GVRResourceVolume volume
        The volume of the script bundle. The script bundle is loaded from this volume, and it also serves as the default volume for scripts referenced in the bundle.

    • Method Detail

      • getContent

        public GVRScriptBundle.GVRScriptBundleFile getContent()
        Returns the contents of the bundle.
        Returns:
        The GVRScriptBundle.GVRScriptBundleFile object.

      • loadFromFile

        public static GVRScriptBundle loadFromFile(GVRContext gvrContext,
                                           java.lang.String filePath,
                                           GVRResourceVolume volume)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Loads a GVRScriptBundle from a file.
        Parameters:
        gvrContext - The GVRContext to use for loading.
        filePath - The file name of the script bundle in JSON format.
        volume - The GVRResourceVolume from which to load script bundle.
        Returns:
        The GVRScriptBundle object with contents from the JSON file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the bundle cannot be loaded.
